text: ma kan yanbaghi lilnabii muhamad salaa allah ealayh wasalam waladhin amanuu 'an yadeuu bialmaghfirat lilmushrikina, walaw kanuu dhwyun qurabat lahum min baed ma matuu ealaa sharkihim biallah waeibadat al'awthani, watabayan lahum 'anahum 'ashab aljahim limawtihim ealaa alsharika, wallah la yaghfir lilmushrikina, kama qal taealaa: {'inn alllah la yaghfir 'an yushrak bih (4:48)} wakama qal subhanaha: {'innah man yushrik bialllah faqad harram alllah ealayh aljannata}
